aboutBlock.title: Center for maxillofacial surgery and dentistry
aboutBlock.desc: SAIF PROFACE is a modern center of maxillofacial surgery and dentistry designed to provide high quality medical services in the field of restoring the health and aesthetics of the face and oral cavity. Our center is equipped with advanced medical equipment and staffed by a team of highly qualified specialists who prioritize patient safety, effective treatment and high level of comfort.
aboutBlock.descTwo: We prioritize patient safety, effective treatment, and a high level of comfort.
aboutBlock.doctorthree: PhD in Medicine, Maxillofacial and Plastic Surgeon

servicesBlock.title: Our Services
servicesBlock.correction: Correction of congenital defects of the face and jaw
servicesBlock.hirurgy: Surgical treatment of traumas and fractures
servicesBlock.face: Elimination of neoplasms of the face and jaw
servicesBlock.desclast: Orthognathic surgery restores harmony and confidence. Our service will help you to find a beautiful smile and improve the quality of life
servicesBlock.descTwo: Therapeutic dentistry (treatment of caries and its complications)
servicesBlock.five: Periodontology (treatment and prevention of gum diseases)
servicesBlock.six: Orthodontics (diagnostics, braces, eliners and removable mouth guards)

advantagesBlock.title: Our Advantages
advantagesBlock.converDesc: Our center is located in a convenient and easily accessible location, making it a comfortable visit for residents of the city and region
advantagesBlock.guarantDesc: We are trusted by patients due to our reputation and many positive reviews
advantagesBlock.descThree: The Center is equipped with the latest technology and specialized equipment, which allows us to carry out diagnosis and treatment with maximum accuracy and safety
advantagesBlock.descOne: Doctors and medical staff of ”SAIF PROFACE” are experienced and continuing to improve their skills at international conferences and seminars
advantagesBlock.descTwo: We take into account the unique needs and wishes of each patient, developing personalized treatment plans to achieve the best possible results
advantagesBlock.stateDesc: The Center is equipped with the latest technology and specialized equipment, which allows us to carry out diagnosis and treatment with maximum accuracy and safety
advantagesBlock.descFour: At “SAIF PROFACE“, patients have access to a full range of services, from diagnosis and prevention to complex surgical interventions and aesthetic procedures
advantagesBlock.descFive: We have created a cozy and relaxed atmosphere in our center to make visiting doctors as comfortable and relaxed an experience as possible
